Uses of Class
org.jeo.raster.DataBuffer

  • Packages that use DataBuffer 
    Package Description
    org.jeo.raster
    Raster model.

    • Uses of DataBuffer in org.jeo.raster

      Methods in org.jeo.raster that return DataBuffer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static DataBuffer DataBuffer.create(ByteBuffer buffer, DataType datatype)
      Creates a new wrapper from a byte buffer and specified datatype.
      static DataBuffer DataBuffer.create(int size, DataType datatype)
      Creates a new wrapper by allocating a new buffer of the specified size and type.
      DataBuffer Raster.data()
      The raw data for the raster.
      DataBuffer<T> DataBuffer.flip()
      Flips the buffer.
      DataBuffer<T> DataBuffer.put(int i, T val)
      Puts data into the buffer at the specified position.
      DataBuffer<T> DataBuffer.put(Object val)
      Puts data into the buffer at the current position.
      static <T> DataBuffer<T> DataBuffer.resample(DataBuffer<T> buffer, Dimension from, Dimension to)
      Resamples the buffer using nearest neighbour interpolation.
      DataBuffer<T> DataBuffer.rewind()
      Rewinds the buffer.
      DataBuffer<T> DataBuffer.word()
      Advances the word index to the next value and sets the buffer position to the same value.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Sets the raw data for the raster.

      Resamples the buffer using nearest neighbour interpolation.
